text: (nabiye!) musagen pasuva israyilvarunge parampara daruvangen vu pradhaninva oba avadhanaya nokalehida? ovun “allahge margayehi api yuddha kirimata apata (pradhanatvaya dærimata) ek rajeku yavanu (mænava!)” yayi tamange nabi veta pævasu avasthavedi, ohu “yuddha kala yutuya yayi obata niyama karanu læbuvahot, oba yuddha nokara (æt vi) sitinnehuda?”yi vimasuveya. (eyata) ovun “apage janatavada, apage nivesda, athæra apiva pitamam karanu læba sitiyadi (apava pitamam kala) ovun samaga allahge margayehi api yuddha nokara sitimata apata kumana (badhavakda)?”yi vimasuha. namut yuddha karana men niyoga karanu læbu vita, ovungen samahareku hæra, (an aya yuddha nokara) pasubæsa nævatunaha. (mevæni) aparadhakaruvanva allah hondin danneya
